name: Proyect Aria
description:
Project Aria is a metroidvania prototype with role-playing mechanics. You can farm, level up, learn skills, upgrade your equipment.

I apologize in advance for the poor handling of multi-language.

Although it's early stage, I consider it theoretically playable.

Compatible with controllers

Synopsis: 

From the beginning there existed a great tree which was cared for by celestial beings, this tree kept in harmony worlds where demons, spirits and humans lived in harmony. 

However, Evankhel, a powerful sorcerer, attacked the tree, breaking its branches and uprooting its roots. 

The celestial beings imprisoned the sorcerer but the damage was done. The peace between kingdoms was over.

PD: I am open to new ideas and any help is welcome.
